text: Agdistis neglecta is a moth in the family Pterophoridae. It is known from Spain, Portugal, southern France, the Balearic Islands, Corsica, mainland Italy and Sardinia. The wingspan is 16–21 mm. The forewings are brown.Die palaearktischen Agdistis -Arten (Lepidoptera, Pterophoridae) The larvae feed on Frankenia species. ==References== Category:Agdistinae Category:Moths of Europe Category:Moths described in 1976
title: Agdistis neglecta
